name: Dungescape!
description:
Dungescape! is a casual, minimalist escape-room game in which players take control of Celeste, a young noblewoman who has been kidnapped and trapped in a labyrinth of mazes of ever-increasing size and complexity. More than 40 rooms await to challenge adventurers in this humble kickoff for solo-dev Autism Fanaticism Gaming!

Dungescape! is developed in RPGMaker VX. For those new to this popular franchise of 2D JRPG engines, the relevant controls are as follows:
- ARROW KEYS: Move Celeste (+HOLD SHIFT: Sprint), Highlight Menu Option.
- ENTER/RETURN or SPACE BAR: Confirm, Advance Text.
- ESC: Go Back, Cancel, Open In-Game Menu.
